Summary: ascending from earth bright sphere then changed to orange then back to then picked up speed till disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsJust walked out to take dog out and meeting girlfriend in yard stepped down off porch glanced up at sky and noticed bright red light! I did a double take and to see if I saw blinking lights to disregard as a very low plane in night sky. Its winter so at 6:55pm its dark out but it came a tad closer as it ascended and change to fire orange then back red I pulled phone out and it started to pick up speed and eventually ascended out of sight.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Flint
There were no other sightings in Flint on or around December 12th 2012
